name: Magnetic Sorcery
description:
AET334F Scripting Final

Made by Anqing Chen, Seth Brotherton, Jake Gollub, Micah Chow, Nicholas Chu, and Christopher Lee.

Shoot up enemies, toss around metal, phase through walls, and do whatever you need to cross each level.

Controls:

  • WASD movement
  • Space to jump
  • Shift to roll
  • left-click to shoot
  • right-click to activate magnet magic
